com.franza.Academic.ac

Class AC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.franza.Academic.ac.AC
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DepartmentAC

    public abstract class AC
extends java.lang.Object

    Non-instantiable class that contains all the signatures for operations further implemented in the application controller classes.

    • Method Detail

      • handleOperation

        public abstract java.util.List<TO> handleOperation(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                                   java.lang.String operation)
                                            throws InvalidInputException

        Abstract signature of a method that carries out operations using the data given in input by the user and acquired through the servlet.

        Parameters:
        req - : servlet request that contains variables and data filled by the user.
        operation - : string that contains the value of the operation to be carried out.
        Returns:
        the instance of the application controller.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - Exception thrown when one or more inputs given by the user are not valid. It is generated by the operations of the instantiated bean.

      • getBean

        public JavaBean getBean()

        Getter method for the instantiated java bean: provides the value of the stored java bean.

        Returns:
        the java bean to be provided.

      • setBean

        public AC setBean(JavaBean bean)

        Setter method for the instantiated java bean: sets the value of the java bean given in input.

        Parameters:
        bean - : java bean to be set.
        Returns:
        the instance of the application controller.
